name: Content Management
description: Handles the creation, storage, and distribution of digital and physical content within the insurance organization.

sub_capabilities.name: Document Storage and Retrieval
sub_capabilities.description: Manages secure storage and easy retrieval of policy documents, claims records, and regulatory files.

sub_capabilities.name: Content Publishing
sub_capabilities.description: Supports the publication and distribution of policy guidelines, claims procedures, and marketing materials.

sub_capabilities.name: Content Compliance Management
sub_capabilities.description: Ensures content meets regulatory standards and legal requirements.

sub_capabilities.name: Records Retention Management
sub_capabilities.description: Manages retention policies and ensures proper archival and disposal of records.
